lead_paragraph: Leicester City forward Riyad Mahrez was named English football's player of the year by the Professional Footballers' Association on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Leicester's Mahrez Named English PFA Player of the Year
headline.main: Leicester's Mahrez Named English PFA Player of the Year
